home.title: Gaia Project Solo Helper
home.play1: Play the Automa Solo Mode of Gaia Project.
home.play2: This helper application replaces the Automa cards and guides you through the solo rules. You can play against up to 3 Automas.

generalSetup.title: General Setup
generalSetup.intro: Set up the game as normal with the following changes:
generalSetup.gameBoard: Setup the game board for {playerCount} players. Rotate the whole board so that the spaces of the board form horizontal rows.
generalSetup.federationTokens: Federation Tokens: Return one of each federation token to the box. Randomly place the token on the research board and place the remaining tokens as normal.

faction.title: Automa Faction Setup
faction.structures: Prepare the Automa supply with all it's structures.
faction.playerTokens: Place player tokens on the VP track and on the research areas.
faction.startVP: Automa starts the game with {count} VP.
faction.satellites: Place one satellite on each "0" space on the scoring board.
faction.initialMinePlacement: Place {count} mines on planets of the Automa's home type (closest to the center space).
faction.neutralPlayer: Neutral Player: Take two satellites of an unused color and place one on each ranking track next to the final scoring tiles; the number on each final scoring tile determines the satellite's position on that ranking track.

income.title: Income
income.collect: Income: Collect ore, knowledge, credits and power.
income.gaia: Gaia: Get power tokens from Gaia area, transform Transdim planets with Gaiaformers.

playerTurn.text: Please make your turn - or pass.
playerTurn.passInfo: Collect your round booster victory points (if any) and take a new round booster.

gainVictoryPoints.text: Automa gains {count} victory point. | Automa gains {count} victory points.

buildMine.validPlanets: Valid Planets: Empty, in range (including Transdim Planet).

faction.taklons: Shortest distance to one of your planets.

scoringFinalTile.planet-types: Planets of a type the Automa has not colonized yet.
scoringFinalTile.space-sector-tiles: Planets in a sector without Automa planets.

execute.title: Execute:
execute.placeSatellite: Place satellite adjacent to new mine if it is not adjacent to another Automa structure.
execute.planetTypeVP: If this mine is the Automa's first on that planet type, it gains +2 VP.

execute.title: Execute:
execute.researchLabAdvanceResearchAreaRandom: If upgraded to a research lab:
execute.tradingStationVP: After upgrading to a trading station, the Automa gains +3 VP.

powerQic.placeToken: Place action token on an uncovered Power/Q.I.C. action space.

researchArea.validResearchArea: Valid: Any research area where Automa can advance or an advanced tech tile is available.

execute.title: Execute:
execute.techTile: If level 4 and advanced tech tile, remove the tile.

botPass.title: Automa passes.
botPass.roundBoosterReturn: Place old round booster to the right of the others.

endOfRound.title: End of Round
endOfRound.removeScoringTile: Remove this round's round scoring tile.

endOfGame.title: End of Game
endOfGame.scoringFinalTileScoring: Automa gains victory points from Final Scoring Tiles.
endOfGame.scoringFinalTileFederationStructures: For the final scoring tile "most structures in federations", count the Automa’s total number of structures and subtract one from that to determine its number of structures in federations.
endOfGame.researchScoring: Automa gains victory points from Research Scoring.
endOfGame.resourceScoring: Automa doesn't get any points from Resource scoring.
